Detailed Description

The hashtable.

Simple hashtable with long keys. Implemented with an array of linklists.

Remarks:
To obtain the hash value : index = key % size.

Field Documentation

long PIZHashTable::flags

Bit Flags.

long PIZHashTable::count

Number of elements in the hashtable.

long PIZHashTable::size

Number of linklists in the hashtable.

PIZLinklist** PIZHashTable::hashTable

Pointer to the hashtable's array of linklists.
